Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: share based compensation related proceeds net of taxes paid on withholding shares
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire business two net of cash acquired
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: debt issued to related party for net asset transfers
foreign currency transaction gain loss realized excluding cash
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain on sale of business excluding transaction costs
noncash or part noncash acquisition intangible assets acquired1
other significant noncash transaction value of consideration given1
restructuring and other related costs net of payments
right of use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability

__unmapped__: cash received from payments to settle derivative instruments
excise tax accrued on net share repurchased not paid
gain loss on sales of assets and asset impairment charges
payment to related party in connection with asset transfer
payments for proceeds from hedge investing activities
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from payments to minority shareholders
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
